p: All human cancer cells were maintained in RPMI 1640 medium supplemented with 10% FBS and penicillin (100 units/ml)/streptomycin (100 µg/ml)/amphotericin B (0.25 µg/ml). All cells were maintained in humidified air containing 5% CO 2 at 37 °C and cultured every 2–3 days. All cells were cultured in tissue culture flasks in humidified air containing 5% CO 2 at 37 °C and cultured every 2–3 days.
